modules.description: Decodes and encodes quoted-printable data using RFC2047 standards, handling inline email headers with non-ASCII characters. It processes byte sequences through a decoder that tracks decoded bytes and a encoder that manages output buffers. Functions support manual input/output control, allowing precise handling of malformed data and partial encoding/decoding states.

Encodes and decodes data using quoted-printable encoding with strict 80-character line length enforcement. Processes byte sequences and strings, ensuring compliance with RFC2045 standards. Detects and flags violations of the 80-character rule during decoding to prevent potential security risks.

Encodes and decodes quoted-printable data according to RFC2047, supporting inline email headers with non-ASCII characters. It manages byte sequences through a decoder that tracks decoded bytes and an encoder that handles output buffers, enabling manual control over input and output. Operations include processing malformed data and maintaining partial encoding/decoding states. Examples include safely transmitting emails with special characters and handling large text streams in a non-blocking manner.
